aboutLandaHolding.title: About Landa Holding
aboutLandaHolding.text: We are a team of Angel Investors who help you make your own team, define your business model, and increase the value of your startup in international markets. What distinguishes us and makes us unique is our assistance in attracting resources and investment, inviting international investors and business associates, in addition to our entrepreneurs, that will all lead to success. Landa Holding aims to gather all resources from all over the world and introduce the best investment opportunities for start-up businesses.

subsids.title: Subsidiary companies of Landa Holding
subsids.text: Landa International Holding consists of 10 active companies operating in Canada and Iran, with offices in the cities of Toronto, Vancouver, Tehran, and Isfahan. Our mission is to invest in creative entrepreneurs, supporting them from the very beginning, starting with ideation, all the way to launching an international startup.

TheStoryOfLanda.title: The story of Landa
TheStoryOfLanda.text: Landa International Holding started its activity in 2017 in Canada as a certified and verified company in the field of investment, resource collection, business development, and startup planning. In 2021, after years of glorious and successful performance, Landa Holding became a federal company known in Canada and Iran.

VisionOfTheLanaHolding.title: VISION OF THE LANDA HOLDING
VisionOfTheLanaHolding.text: Landa offers a diverse range of services, including support for entrepreneurs and innovative startups, as well as investments in scalable startups in global markets. The members of the Landa Investors Association consist of successful senior executives, business leaders, and serial entrepreneurs who come together to capitalize on the best investment opportunities in emerging companies from around the world.

LANDAStartups.title: LANDA Startups
LANDAStartups.LandaTrip: Landa Trip, a startup in the field of tourism and education with an international platform and professional artificial intelligence, began its activities in Iran in 2022.
LANDAStartups.Diaco: Diaco, a startup in the field of industry and automation, operates with CNC Wire Cut machines in Canada and markets in the United States and Europe.
LANDAStartups.VisionRaft: Vision Raft, a startup in the virtual world, children's education sector, expanded its operations in 2022 with the support of MTA Accelerator in Canada.
LANDAStartups.LandaHandicraft: Landa Handicraft, a startup in the handicraft industry, an online store, and a reference point for handicrafts, attracted the necessary capital for platform development for the international market in 2023.
LANDAStartups.SteadySkull: Steady Skull, a startup in the medical field, developed a product to facilitate brain surgery procedures, starting its activities in 2019 with a specialized team.

KeyDifferentiatingFactors.title: distinguishing feature of Landa Holding
KeyDifferentiatingFactors.titleText: The start of any startup and the growth of its initial idea until it reaches the international market requires various services. We are proud to announce that as the first group, we have provided a platform at Landa Holding so that people can benefit from all the necessary services in a safe and professional environment.Every startup starts with an idea. At Landa Business Academy, we grow you on the path to becoming an entrepreneur by providing an opportunity to learn about different businesses and create entrepreneurial thinking.Another distinguishing feature of us is that Landa Holding does not limit itself to the domestic market and seeks to expand startups in the global and international market.
